# my-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default          |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `color`       | `color`        | The color of the icon (default: currentColor) | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `'currentColor'` |
| `name`        | `name`         | The name of the icon to render                | `"arrow-up" \| "bell" \| "box" \| "chevron-down" \| "chevron-left" \| "chevron-right" \| "chevron-up" \| "close" \| "error" \| "file-text" \| "home" \| "image" \| "info" \| "layers" \| "layout" \| "list-ordered" \| "loader" \| "lock" \| "menu" \| "message-square" \| "moon" \| "settings" \| "star" \| "sun" \| "toggle-left" \| "user"` | `undefined`      |
| `size`        | `size`         | The size of the icon (default: 24)            | `number \| string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `24`             |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | Stroke width (default: 2)                     | `number \| string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `2`              |
